name: RPAS Training Academy (Pty) Ltd
about: RPAS Training Academy (Pty) Ltd is a premier drone training facility in South Africa, run by passionate and highly experienced aviation experts from all sectors of the industry. Our mission is to provide clients with premium drone pilot training, propelling them into the future of drone technology. We offer fully accredited SACAA RPC training, including courses for Part 71, manned to unmanned transitions, fixed wing ratings, and BVLOS training. Our programs include theoretical subjects, practical flying, simulator training, and mock skills tests. With a modern learning environment and exceptional customer service, we strive to build a reputation of superior training standards globally. Our instructors are knowledgeable and supportive, ensuring quick attainment of flight skills. We are dedicated to delivering professional training that takes clients from the classroom to operational readiness.
